Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the extent to which Philadelphia Eagles players stayed in the locker room or kneeled during the national anthem.
Understate: The claim understates the fact that none of the Eagles kneeled during the national anthem in 2017 and that there were no reports of players staying in the locker room.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Philadelphia Eagles players stayed in the locker room or kneeled during the national anthem.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Trump was referring to Eagles players when he mentioned players kneeling or staying in the locker room during the national anthem.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, which is that the Eagles players did not engage in the mentioned behaviors during the national anthem.
